ygData.subject: Shadow Vortex - most useless spell or most underratted?
ygData.msgSnippet: I wish I had a p for every time someone has whinged about the shadow vortex spells. 12 Ac lowered, woopeee do!! well lets say for arguments sake that due to
ygData.messageBody:
I wish I had a p for every time someone has whinged about the shadow vortex
spells. 12 Ac lowered, woopeee do!!

well lets say for arguments sake that due to this 12 lower ac (14 with the
new patch i think) you now hit for 2 extra dmg then what you would have
done. I estimate that in a standard fight using a 2 H sword I wouldswing 20
to 30 times. so that is 40 to 60 dmg. times this by the 2 or 3 tanks you
might have in a group and you are looking at 100 to 180 extra dmg, roughly.

While these numbers are fudged, it does show you how much extra dmg you mnay
do. If you really want to test it then next time you fight somthing, take
your helm off, or glovbes and see how much extra dmg.

Oh, and imagine how much a difference 12 Ac would make ina a hige fight
against a dragon or ghould lord which last for ages with lots of tanks
hitting on the mob

Inosolan Braveheart
Human SK 43
Veeshan
